name: Binary Mango
description: We create apps for the world's most amazing innovators.

team.title: Director
team.name: Jacobo Koenig
team.bioHtml: For 5+ years, I have helped startups develop their teams and MVPs, and achieve funding and profitability. I work with people that want to make an impact.

jobs.title: Business Development Leader
jobs.description:
We are terrible at sales, but we can do some mean programming! Thus we're looking for somebody that can take Binary Mango's raw potential and knowledge and use it to prospect, work, and close new projects.

That's it! (As I said, we're terrible at sales)

We are terrible at sales, but we can do some mean programming! Thus we're looking for somebody that can take Binary Mango's raw potential and knowledge and use it to prospect, work, and close new projects.

That's it! (As I said, we're terrible at sales)

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description:
Hello, World..! We're looking for a self-driven, ambitious Project Manager for a series of projects that are sure to shine within your portfolio.

We're looking for someone that understands SCRUM and is really (really!) good with either Jira or Trello. Experience managing mobile developers is a huge plus!

Looking forward to hearing from you, and don't forget to send over relevant experience.
